alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Lower Brewster County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brewster County through 630 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Study Butte, or 12 miles east of Lajitas, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lajitas, Panther Junction, Chisos Basin, Study Butte, Castolon, Big Bend National Park, Terlingua, Terlingua Ranch Airport, Terlingua Ranch Lodge and Barton Warnock Environmental Educational Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Lower Brewster County
